SEARCH
Package dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands

Class MagicCommand

java.lang.Object
dev.ua.theroer.magicutils.commands.MagicCommand
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicCommand, HelpCommandBase
public abstract class MagicCommand extends Object
Abstract base class for all custom commands. Provides utilities for command info, subcommands, and argument parsing.
